#!/bin/bash
# Installation Script

## download and install steamcmd
cd /tmp
mkdir -p /mnt/server/steamcmd
curl -sSL -o steamcmd.tar.gz https://steamcdn-a.akamaihd.net/client/installer/steamcmd_linux.tar.gz
tar -xzvf steamcmd.tar.gz -C /mnt/server/steamcmd
cd /mnt/server/steamcmd

chown -R root:root /mnt
export HOME=/mnt/server

## Install game using steamcmd
GUARDCODE="${STEAM_AUTH}"
if [ -z $GUARDCODE ]
then
    echo ""
    echo "### You did not specify a Steam Guardcode"
    echo "### A new one should be send to you shortly"
    echo "### Enter it in the startup-config after this installation is finished and reinstall the Server"
    sleep 10
    timeout 60 ./steamcmd.sh +login ${STEAM_USER} ${STEAM_PASS} +quit
    exit 1
fi

./steamcmd.sh +force_install_dir $HOME +set_steam_guard_code ${STEAM_AUTH} +login ${STEAM_USER} ${STEAM_PASS} +app_update ${SRCDS_APPID} ${EXTRA_FLAGS} validate +quit
status=$?

if [ $status -ne 0 ]
then
    echo ""
    echo "### The Download was not successful"
    echo "### Probably the entered Guardcode was wrong"
    echo "### A new one should be send to you shortly"
    echo "### Enter it in the startup-config after this installation is finished and reinstall the Server"
    sleep 10
    sleep 10
    timeout 30 ./steamcmd.sh +login ${STEAM_USER} ${STEAM_PASS} +quit
    exit 1
fi

## set up 32 bit libraries
mkdir -p $HOME/.steam/sdk32
cp -v linux32/steamclient.so ../.steam/sdk32/steamclient.so

## set up 64 bit libraries
mkdir -p $HOME/.steam/sdk64
cp -v linux64/steamclient.so ../.steam/sdk64/steamclient.so

CONFIG=/mnt/server/game/csgo/cfg/autoexec.cfg
if [ -f "$CONFIG" ]; then
    echo "Removing existing autoexec.cfg"
    rm "$CONFIG"
    echo "Downloading autoexec.cfg template"
    cd /mnt/server/game/csgo/cfg
    curl -sSL -o autoexec.cfg https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Ballaual/eggs/master/game_eggs/steamcmd_servers/counter_strike/counter_strike_2/autoexec.cfg
else 
    echo "autoexec.cfg does not yet exist, downloading template"
    cd /mnt/server/game/csgo/cfg/
    curl -sSL -o autoexec.cfg https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Ballaual/eggs/master/game_eggs/steamcmd_servers/counter_strike/counter_strike_2/autoexec.cfg
fi

TVCONFGIG=/mnt/server/game/csgo/cfg/srctv.cfg
if [ -f "$TVCONFGIG" ]; then
    echo "Removing existing srctv.cfg"
    rm "$TVCONFGIG"
    echo "Downloading srctv.cfg template"
    cd /mnt/server/game/csgo/cfg
    curl -sSL -o srctv.cfg https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Ballaual/eggs/master/game_eggs/steamcmd_servers/counter_strike/counter_strike_2/srctv.cfg
else 
    echo "srctv.cfg does not yet exist, downloading template"
    cd /mnt/server/game/csgo/cfg/
    curl -sSL -o srctv.cfg https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Ballaual/eggs/master/game_eggs/steamcmd_servers/counter_strike/counter_strike_2/srctv.cfg
fi
